title: Phrasebook PRO v1.77 APK is Here ! [Latest] | TPB_1
description:
Phrasebook PRO

Are you planning a vacation in far-away lands?
Are you planning a business trip abroad?
In this case our multilingual phrasebook PhraseBox PRO is just what you need!
PhraseBox PRO contains 1100+ carefully selected phrases for your pleasant traveling all over the world!

Full version PhraseBox PRO Topics:

 Basics phrases (Greetings, Saying goodbye, Meeting, Questions, Agreement/Disagreement, Wishes, Emergency cases, Dating)
 Traveling (Customs / Border, Traveling by train, Traveling by plane, Traveling by bus, Traveling by ship, Traveling by car / Gas station, At the car rental company, Camping)
 How to getâ€¦ (City transport, On the street)

 Calendar (Dates, Time, Numbers, Weather)
 Hairdresserâ€™s/Beauty salon

Features PhraseBox PRO:

 Original design.
 Interface in English.
 PhraseBox PRO is convenient and easy in use.
 16 available languages: Arabic, Chinese, Czech, French, German, Greek, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish.
 Translits for languages: Arabic, Chinese, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Thai, Russian.
 1100+ carefully selected phrases for your pleasant traveling all over the world!
 Each phrase is translated and dubbed by native speakers.
 Download only the languages that you need at the moment. You can download language packets both to internal storage and to USB storage.
 Quick search of phrases by keywords. Input a part of word and the app will show you all phrases with this word in all forms. Phrase search is possible both in English and in foreign languages.
